El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento y cambio de repuestos que necesita su mototaxi para seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Segundo es una persona responsable y trabajadora  que lo único que desea es que sus hijos tengan un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo, 47, lives with his family in their own house which has electricity as the only utility.  It is located in the district of Zaña which belongs to the province of Chiclayo.  The people of this area are involved in agriculture, livestock farming and tourism.

Segundo has a motor-taxi service (transportation used to cover short distances with a maximum capacity of three people) which he has been running for several years. He provides the service in the same area where he lives despite all the competition he has.  He starts out early to gather as many passengers as he can from different locations in order to increase his income and cover household expenses and necessities.

He has requested a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to pay for maintenance and buy repair parts needed for his vehicle.  This is so he can continue providing good customer service and improve his family's lifestyle.  Segundo is a responsible, hard-working person who only wants to the best for his children.

loans.use: To pay for maintenance and buy repair parts for his motor-taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk for resale

loans.name: Edgar Alejandro

texts.es:
El joven Edgar Alejandro es soltero, tiene 22 años de edad, curso las estudios de bachillerato, se dedica a la confección de pantalones de lona, inició este trabajo gracias al apoyo de sus padres, y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de telas de lona y poder producir mas, y obtener mejores ganancias en el futuro espera que su negocio sea prospero.
texts.en:
Young Edgar Alejandro is 22 years old, single and has a high school education.  He has a business making canvas trousers, which he started with his parents' help eight years ago.

He is requesting a loan to buy canvas fabric so he can increase production and improve his earnings.  He wants his business to be successful in the future.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene tiene 32 años, es soltera. Viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Sivia. Para ella la clave del éxito esta en la responsabilidad, puntualidad y el de valorar a sus clientes. A pesar de no tener una educación completa, decidió emprender un negocio que es la venta de ropa, para ello monto una pequeña tienda, ya que son muchos los clientes que la visitan a su establecimiento.  Ahora puede cubrir los gastos familiares, entre ello ayudar a sus hermanos con su educación. Por tanto procura abastecerse de ropa, y además estar a la vanguardia de la moda, para así no dejar de captar clientes.  Generalmente trabaja por cuenta propia, pero hay ocasiones que sus hermanos la apoyan en el negocio. Mas adelante desea ampliar su tienda, introdociendo nuevos productos. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 soles que solicita, comprará más prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Marlene is 32 years old and single.  She lives in her own house located in the district of Sivia.  In her opinion, the key to success is responsibility, punctuality and customer service.  Despite the fact that she was not able to finish her education she decided to start a business selling clothing.  She set up a small shop and has many customers who visit her establishment.  Now she can cover family expenses and help her siblings with their education.  She tries to stock fashionable garmets to attract customers.  Generally she works independently but sometimes her siblings help out.  In the future she would like to expand her shop and introduce new products.  This is her first loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time. The loan, in the amount of 3,000 PEN, will be used to buy mO. clothing.

loans.use: To buy more clothing.

loans.name: Takku Ligguey 5 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupement a pour activité principale le commerce, elles évoluent dans ce domaine depuis plus de 20 ans. Avec ce prêt qui est destiné à l'achat de marchandises, elles vont achetées des produits maraîchers, halieutiques et autres (poissons séchés, choux, carottes) pour les revendre  aux clients. Avec ce crédit, elles veulent faire augmenter leur pouvoir d'achat pour avoir une activité continue
texts.en: The Takku Ligguey 5 Group is made up of saleswomen who have been working in retail for over 20 years. This loan will allow them to stay in business by increasing their purchasing power. They will use the money to restock on food products for resale, including vegetables (cabbages, carrots) and dried fish.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale.

loans.name: Ade Pa Trust Bank Group

texts.en:
Mary sells batik and clothes in Berekum. She is 36 years-old and married with three children. Mary has been running this business for eight years now but does not have adequate working capital to support her business. Most of the time, she buys supplies on credit and makes payment after sales.  She wants to use the loan to purchase additional stock and also expand by acquiring a shop. She hopes to use part of her earnings to finance her children’s education. 

She belongs to the community group called “Ade Pa Trust Group”. In this group, members assist one another to provide support in handling the repayment.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes.

loans.name: Jaime Alberto

texts.es:
Jaime, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, aprendió el oficio de la agricultura por su padre, lleva 17 años de estar dedicado al cultivo, a través de las cosechas ha alimentado a la familia, pudiendo vender una parte de la cosecha para generar ingresos.
Actualmente el solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, semilla, herbicidas para el cultivo de maíz, maicillo y ajonjolí, el préstamo será una gran ayuda para solventar la compra de insumos agrícolas.
El objetivo de Jaime es mejorar los cultivos, apoyar a su familia y velar por sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Jaime is a farmer and lives with his wife and three children.  He learned the agriculture trade from his father and has been growing crops for 17 years.  He is able to feed his family with part of the produce he harvests and sells the rest to generate an income.

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, seeds and herbicides to plant corn, millet and sesame.  The loan will be of great help in purchasing the farm supplies he needs.

Jaime's goal is to improve his crops and support his family by making sure they have everything they need.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and herbicides for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a loom and materials

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis de 39 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de Paijan que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 4 años Luis se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su  seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea más grande y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Luis es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles todo lo mejor a los suyos.
texts.en:
Luis is 39 years old and lives with his wife and children in his own home which does not receive basic services.  His home is located in Paijan district, in La Libertad department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

For four years, Luis has sold basic household products (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc.) and drinks.  His business is set up in his home for his own security.  He uses the profits that he makes from selling his products to try and cover all his expenses and improve his family's quality of life.

In order to expand his business, Luis has requested a loan for 2,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise.  His sole aim is to enlarge his business and have more products in stock to offer his customers.  Luis is a responsible, committed and hard-working person who tries to provide his family with the best.

loans.use: to buy more food products with which to stock his store

loans.name: Omar Fredy

texts.es:
Omar de 33 años de edad, vive con su familia en casa alquilada, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Yonan que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca.  Los pobladores de ésta zona se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Omar maneja su propia mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) desde hace algunos años aproximadamente, está actividad lo realiza en la misma zona donde vive, a pesar de la competencia en el mismo trabajo, él trata en lo posible, desde muy temprano movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos, y así pueda tener mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades de su familia.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi y la compra de un pequeño lote donde construirá posteriormente su vivienda.  Omar es una persona responsable y trabajadora  que lo único que desea es que su familia tenga lo necesario para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Omar is 33 years old. He lives with his family in a rented house which has electricity and running water. It is located in the district of Yonan, which belongs to the department of Cajamarca. The residents of this area work in farming and cattle ranching.  

Omar drives his own motorcycle taxi (he uses it for short distance trips, with a maximum of 3 passengers). He has done this for a few years. He does this activity in the same  area where he lives. Despite the competition, he does what he can to move a good number of passengers to their different destinations, starting very early. In this way, he tries to have more income to pay for his expenses and his family's needs.   

The loan he has asked Edpyme Alternativa for is for 1500 nuevos soles. It will be used to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi and buy a small lot where he will later build his house. Omar is a responsible and hardworking person and the only thing he wants is for his family to have what they need to get ahead.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi and buy a small lot where he will later build his house.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia de 29 años, convive con cesar de 30 años, con quien tiene 02 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Sivia. Desde muy pequeña aprendió el trabajo de carpintería, pues sus familiares se encagaban de fabricar muebles, pero para ello este negocio no le era suficiente y atractivo. Con el pasar del tiempo, logró montar su propia tienda, en ella expende toda clase de productos de primera necesidad. Pero en un inicio le fue un reto capatar clientela pero el estar cosntantemente en su negocio ha logrado obtenerlos. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente comprometida en cancelar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles que solicita, invertirá en la compra de más productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda.
texts.en:
Virginia is married and lives with her husband of 30 years, and they have 2 children. They live together in their own house in the district of Silvia. From the time she was little she learned the craft of carpentry.Her relatives assembled and made furniture but she was not attracted to or fulfilled by this line of work.

As time went by she started her own store expanding into all sorts of staples. In the beginning it was hard to get customers but she was there all the time and she began to get them.

This will be her first loan with MFP, and she promises to make her payments on time.
With the 2000 soles she is asking for, she will buy more supplies of staples for her store.

loans.use: to buy products in order to supply her store

loans.name: Sylvain

texts.fr:
Client  âgé de 42 ans et célibataire sans enfant.Ayant fini ses études universitaires, et ne trouvant  pas du travail, il a crée une micro-entreprise axée sur la vente des produits alimentaires et vivres frais  en détail.


il a bénéficie de plusieurs cycles de pets, il a gère une boucherie , avec une capacité de vente et des  remboursements efficaces. 
Avec une demande aussi  forte,le quatrième prêt lui a permis d'ouvrir  une chambre froide , il a achète des cartons de vivres frais comme le poisson, la viande de bœuf , des cotes de porcs et de la volaille
 Il envisage beaucoup épargner et a l'heure actuelle , il est entrain d'atteindre petit a petit ses objectifs.

 Exemplaire dans ses attributs d'homme d'affaire il entretien  des relations d’amitié et de bonne coopération dans sa communauté.
texts.en:
This client is forty two years old and single, without children. Having finished his university studies and not finding any work, he created a small business based on the retail sale of food products, including fresh food.  

He has benefited from several loan cycles, and has managed a butcher shop with a capacity for sales and effective repayments. With an equally strong request, the fourth loan has permitted him to open a cold storage room. He purchased boxes of fresh food like fish, beef, pork chops and poultry. 

He plans to save a lot, and right now he is in the process of accomplishing his objectives little by little. Exemplary in his characteristics as a businessman, he maintains friendly relationships and good cooperation in his community.

loans.use: To open a cold storage room and purchase fish, beef, pork chops and poultry.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y su hija de 2 años, ella tiene una tienda de productos de primera necesidad: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, trabaja todos los días de la semana.
Ella necesita el préstamo para surtir más su negocio y comprar: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, para que sus clientes estén satisfechos, y mejorar el inventario.
La  aspiración de María siempre mantener su negocio surtido aumentar en clientes y darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two year old child. She has a staples general store. She sells rice, beans, sugar, soap, and detergents. She works every day of the week.

She is asking for this loan to buy supplies for her store such as rice, sugar, and beans, so she can satisfy her clients and increase her inventory.

María's dream is to be able to maintain her business, increase her client base, and to be able to give her daughter a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and beans in order to supply her business

loans.name: Claudia Lorena

texts.es: Claudia, Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de material como piedras, hilos, para elaborar pulseras, además poster animados, lápices decorados, calcomanías, y más productos que le permitan seguir en el negocio y mejorar sus ventas. Estos prestamos le han ayudado para mejorar su condicion de comerciante, permitiendole mejorar sus ventas y estabilizando un poco su situacion economica.
texts.en: Claudia is asking for a loan to buy supplies like stones and thread to make bracelets, and cartoon posters, decorated pens, stickers or decals, and other products that will let her continue in her business and increase her sales. The past loans have helped her improve her commercial business, allowing her to increase her sales and stabilize her economic situation a bit.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as stones and thread, and cartoon posters, decorated pens, stickers, and other products for her business

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sabina; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de lavado de vehículos, ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria lavando diferentes vehículos, ella trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de lavado de vehículos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para lavar los vehículos como detergentes, telas y pinturas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sabina is a member of the "Kanchary" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Sabina is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business washing vehicles.  She works in an itinerant manner, washing different vehicles.  She works from 9.00am to 5.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Sabina would like to expand and improve her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy materials for washing vehicles such as detergents, cloths and paints, wholesale.

Sabina is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy materials for washing vehicles such as detergents, cloths and paints, wholesale

loans.name: Julio Demetrio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio Demetrio; el tiene 71 años de edad y es viudo y tiene 6 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de librería y también tiene un internet, el socio vende artículos de escritorio como cuadernos,lápices,borradores entre otros artículos de escritorio y también atiende un internet desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de estos negocios las ocia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de librería e internet. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como lápices, cuadernos y borradores y también para el mantenimiento de las computadoras.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Julio Demetrio is a member of the "Kanchary" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Julio Demetrio is 71 years old, widowed, and has six children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his stationery store business.  He also has an Internet cafe.  Julio sells stationery supplies including composition books, pencils and erasers.  He also serves in his Internet cafe from 8.00am to 10.00pm.  Through these businesses, he gets his children ahead.  He would like to expand and improve his stationery store and internet cafe.  He is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as pencils, composition books and erasers.  He would also like to have maintenance work done on his computers.

Julio is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pencils, composition books and erasers, and to have maintenance work carried out on his computers

loans.name: Killa Group

texts.es:
LLos socios pertenecen al banco comunal “KILLA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bertha Elena; ella es soltera y tiene 53 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, chompas, polos y blusas, ella vende en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares o al público en general, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, blusas, polos y pantalones al por mayor.
 
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de comida, negocio de ferretería, negocio de venta de chompas, negocio de transporte y negocio de llamadas telefónicas.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “KILLA” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco. 

This member's name is Bertha Elena. She is single and 53 years old. She has 4 children. She has her own business buying and selling clothing. She sells pants, sweaters, polo shirts and blouses. She sells independently taking the clothes to different places or to the general public. With this business she gets her family ahead. Bertha Elena wants to grow and improve her business selling clothes. She is asking for the loan to buy pants, blouses, polo shirts wholesale.
 
The members work in selling artisanal crafts, food, hardware, sweaters, in transportation, and providing a telephone calling service.

Bertha Elena is thankful to those who are taking a part in her dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, polo shirts wholesale.

loans.name: Casimira

texts.es: Casimira tiene 23 años, convive con Yuri de 25 años, con quien tiene 01 hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Puerto Cocos, Pichari. Ella es una buena y noble mujer que desde pequeña se caracterizó por su buen comportamiento y por el respeto hacia los demás. Cuando tenía 17 años terminó el colegio, pero la falta de capital hizo que no lograra seguir una carrera profesional. Sin embargo siguio adelante, e incursionó en la venta de jugos de frutas, pues como su padre cultivaba frutas, entonces vio la necesidad de forjarse un trabajo propio, es así que monta su fuente de soda, ofreciendo diversidad de jugos de frutas. en un inicio solo contaba con un poco capital y con ello compró su licuoestractora, al paso del tiempo iba amobalndo su local, hasta convertirse en un lugar agradable en el que la mayoría de los clientes van a consumir sus jugos. Ella recibe el apoyo de su esposo, quien es la persona que le trae las frutas del campo. Este será su tercer crédito, por lo que se compromete en cancelar el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1000 soles que solicita, comprará más muebles para acondicionar su local.
texts.en:
Casimira is 23 years old and lives with 25-year-old Yuri.  The couple have one child and live in their own home which is located in Puerto Cocos community, in Pichari.  Casimira is a good and honest woman who has been noted for her good behavior and her respect for other people since she was a young girl.  Casimira finished school when she was 17 but a lack of capital meant that she couldn't study for a professional degree.  However, she got ahead and started selling fruit juices.  As her father grew fruit, she saw the need to create her own job and so set up a juice bar, selling a variety of fruit juices.  At first, she only had a small amount of capital which she used to buy a juicer.  Over time, she furnished her premises and turned it into a pleasant place where her customers come to drink the juice she prepares.  Casimira receives support from her husband.  He is the one who transports the fruits from the field.

This will be Casimira's third loan and she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to buy more furniture for her premises.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her premises

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eulogia; ella tiene 53 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, ella tiene un carro que hace servicio publico, la socia también se dedica al negocio de venta de pasto y negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes, chanchos y gallinas, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de transporte, negocio de venta de pasto y negocio de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales, pasto y para el mantenimiento de su carro.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eulogia is a member of the "Kanchary" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Eulogia is 53 years old, married, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her transport business.  She has a car which she uses to provide a public transport service.  She also sells fodder and raises animals such as guinea pigs, pigs and hens.  Through these small businesses, she gets her children ahead in life.  Eulogia would like to expand and improve her transport business, her fodder business and her animal business.  She is requesting this loan to buy animals and fodder, and to have her car serviced.

Eulogia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy animals and fodder, and to have her car serviced

loans.name: Ana  Cecilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana Cecilia; ella tiene 55años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara diferentes platos como pollo al horno,bisteck,estofado de pollo y sopas, la socia trabaja en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia también se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de comida y negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia is a member of the "Kanchary" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Ana Cecilia is 55 years old, single, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling food.  She prepares different dishes such as roast chicken, steak, chicken stew and soups.  She works as a street vendor from 8.00am to 7.00pm.  She also sells beauty products.  Through these businesses, she gets her children ahead in life.  Ana Cecilia would like to expand her food business and her business selling beauty products.  She is requesting this loan to buy cooking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables, wholesale.

Ana Cecilia is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables, wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, cosmetics, accessories, etc.

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es:
El señor Aurelio es casado, tiene 45 años de edad, cursó el segundo grado de educación básica, se dedica  a la agricultura como también al comercio ya que cuenta con un tienda para la venta de artículos en general, inició este negocio por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a oficios domésticos.

Solicita un préstamo para compra producto para una tienda, dulce, agua gaseosa, comida en lata, lácteos, y entre otros. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio estable.
texts.en:
Aurelio is 45 years old, married, and studied up to the second year of 'educación básica' (approx. equivalent = 8th grade).  He farms and also sells products as he has a store where he sells general goods.  He started this business on his own initiative and he now has two years experience.  Aurelio has the support of his wife who works as a maid.

Aurelio is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for his store: candies, soda, canned goods, dairy products, etc.  In the future, he hopes to have a stable business.

loans.use: to buy goods for his store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy materials for making shoes.

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es:
Clementina de 56 años, esta casado con Lucio de 56 años, con quien tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Puerto Cocos, Pichari. Ella es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad y ante eso aprovecho para montar su tienda ferretera, negocio del que ahora es la más visitada, y eso gracias a la variedad de precios de sus productos. Sin embargo, no cuenta con movilidad propia, para lograr transportar su mercadería, por elo debe contratar otra movilidad, por lo que le ha resultado muy caro, debido a la distancia y el mal estado de las carreteras, por lo que debe llevarlo al mecáncio, teniendo gastos adicionales.
En éste trabajo, su esposo y sus hijos, son quienes más la apoyan. Ella esta entusiasmada en continuar con este negocio ya que a pesar de todos los gastos que realiza siempre le queda algo como para darse buenas comodidades, y educar a sus hijos. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, utilizará como capital para comprar mercadería para abastecer su  ferretería.
texts.en:
Clementina, 56 years of age, is married to Lucio, also 56, with whom she has 4 children.  Together, they live in their own home located in the Puerto Cocos community in Pichari.  She is well respected in her community and she took advantage of this to open her own hardware store.  Her business is now the most frequented, and this is thanks to the variety of her products’ prices.  Regardless, she does not count on her own means of transportation for moving her merchandise and must hire a vehicle.  This ends being very costly given the distances to travel and the state of disrepair of the roads.  For this reason, she’s had to take it to a mechanic, which has resulted in additional expenses.

It is her husband and children who most support her in this line of work.  She is enthusiastic to continue with her business because, despite all of the expenses she incurs, there is always something left for her and for educating her children.  This will be her third credit with MFP, and she commits to making her loan payments punctually.  She will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she is requesting as capital to buy more merchandise to supply her hardware store.

loans.use: buy products to supply her hardware store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy prepared chocolate and sweet rolls for her business.

loans.name: Giovana

texts.es: Giovana tiene 25 años, convive con Luciano de 32 años, con quien tiene 2 hijos. juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Puerto Cocos, Pichari. Para ella la clave del éxito está en la responsabilidad, puntualidad y en valorar mucho a sus clientes. A pesar de su corta edad, decidió emprender en la venta de ropa, por considerar un negocio rentable, desde entonces viaja a la capital para traer diversos modelos en prendas de vestir. en un comienzo, le fue difícil mantenerse en el negocio, muy pocos clientes tenía, pero las ganas y el esfuerzo de trabajar logró consolidar su negocio. Actualmente la tienda de Giovana es la más concurrida, por el buen trato que ella ofrece y el costo de las prendas al alcance de la exonmía de su clientela. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP por lo que se compromete por tercera vez en cancelar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles ella comprará más prendas de vestir.
texts.en:
Giovana is 25 years old and lives with Luciano, 32, with whom she has 2 children.  They live together in their own home, located in the Puerto Cocos community, Pichari.  For her, the key to success has been in being responsible, punctual, and greatly valuing her customers.  Despite her young age, she decided to embark in the business of selling clothing, which she considered could be profitable.  Since then, she has traveled to the capital to bring back different styles of clothing.  At the start, it was difficult to maintain the business since she had very few customers.  However, through her desire to succeed and the efforts she put into her work, she has managed to strengthen her business.

Currently, Giovana’s store is the busiest because of the excellent service she offers and the pricing of her clothing is within the financial means of her clientele.  This will be her third loan with MFP, and she commits for the third time to making her payments punctually.  She will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she is requesting to buy more articles of clothing.

loans.use: buy more articles of clothing.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam, necesita el préstamo para comprar concentrado, maicillo, granza y vitaminas, D. esa forma atendera las gallinas para que estén bien y en buenas condiciones para que le sigan produciendo y obtener huevos, la decicion D. tomar nuevamente el prestamo, es porque le parecio bien el trabajo, atencion que recibio y el tramite que fue rapido, ella necesita D. estos aportes para mejorar cada dia el negocio.
texts.en: Miriam needs to loan to buy feed, millet, sorghum and vitamins to tend to her chickens so they are well and living in good condition, and continue producing, and to obtain eggs.  She maD. the decision to take a new loan because her work is going well, the attention she received and the transaction was quick.  She needs the contribution to improve her business on a daily basis.

loans.use: To purchase feed, millet, sorghum and vitamins to tend to her chickens well.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Fidel Antonio

texts.es:
Fidel, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 8 y 12 años, el  tiene una tienda de productos básicos (arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz) y un molino nixtamal y por eso todos los días trabaja de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para crecer más su tienda ya que anteriormente la tenía bien surtida, debido a la crisis bajo en ventas y en clientes debido a que no tenía suficiente variedad para ofrecer y ahora tambien tiene variedad de frutas y verduras para obtener más ventas. La compra de fidel sera en gaseosas, jugos, galletas, aceite.
El sueño de Fidel es incrementar sus ventas debidas que tendrá mas variedad y seguir teniendo créditos futuros para seguir trabajando con la institución y de esa forma podrá darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Fidel lives with his wife and his two children aged 8 and 12.  He has a store where he sells basic household products (rice, beans, sugar and corn).  He also has a mill for grinding 'nixtamal' (corn used in making tortillas).  He works every day, from Monday to Sunday.

Fidel will use his loan to further grow his store.  He used to have a well-stocked store but, owing to the crisis, his sales and customers dropped because he didn't have a large enough variety of products to offer his customers.  He now also has a variety of fruit and vegetables in order to obtain more sales.  Fidel will use his loan to buy soda, juices, cookies and oil.

Fidel's dream is to increase his sales by having a greater variety of products available and to continue taking out future loans so that he can continue working with the institution and, in this way, provide his family with the best.

loans.use: to buy soda, juices, cookies and oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael, se dedica a la producción de hortalizas, vive con su esposa y 6 hijos, algunos ya mayores de edad, el oficio de don Rafael inicio desde muy joven, pues acompañaba a su padre para poder aprender, las hortalizas requieren mucho cuido y dedicación, por esta razón no tiene un horario establecido.
Actualmente se encuentra realizando la siembra, para esto solicita un préstamo que cubra los gastos en herbicidas y abono especiales para hortalizas, protegiéndolas de plagas para que produzcan sanamente los frutos.
El sueño de Rafael es que a través de los préstamos, pueda mejorar su trabajo agrícola, obteniendo una cosecha abundante para su familia, con la oportunidad de vender una parte de ella.
texts.en:
Rafael's business is growing vegetables.  He lives with his wife and six children, some of whom are grown up.  Rafael started out in his line of work when he was very young as he would accompany his father so that he could learn from him.  Vegetables require a lot of care and commitment and so he doesn't work regular hours.

Rafael is currently sowing his crops and is requesting a loan to cover the expense of buying special herbicides and fertilizers for his vegetables, to protect them from pests so that they produce healthy fruit.

Rafael's dream is to be able to improve his farm work through loans, obtain an abundant harvest for his family and have the opportunity to sell some of his crops.

loans.use: to buy special herbicides and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Julia Teresa

texts.es:
La señora Julia Teresa es casada, tiene 36 años de edad, cursó los 4 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos los cuales no están estudiando, se dedica a la sastrería a la confecciona de camisas de todos los tamaños, inicio este trabajo gracias apoyo de sus amistades, lleva hasta el momento 15 años de experiencia trabajando como operaria.

Solicita un préstamo para ampliar su capital de producción específicamente para la compra de materiales para confecciona, telas e hilos, espera e el futuro tener su propios negocio.
texts.en:
Julia Teresa is 36 years old, married, and finished her four years of primary education.  She has two children who are not in school.  Julia Teresa works as a tailor, making shirts in all sizes.  She started out in this line of work thanks to the support of her friends.  She now has 15 years experience working as a sewing machine operative.

Julia Teresa is requesting a loan to increase her capital, specifically buying dressmaking materials, fabric and threads.  She hopes, in the future, to own her own business.

loans.use: to buy dressmaking materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc and pay for labour to improve a roof.

loans.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos él se dedica desde hace muchos años a la siembra de granos básicos: maíz y frijoles, su padre le  enseño este oficio, por eso el no tiene un horario establecido de trabajo  de lunes a sábado.
El necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos como: herbicidas para las plagas y semilla para la siembra, abono para que sus cosechas sean abundantes y estén libres de plagas aunque sabe que es un trabajo arduo pero al final da buenas cosechas y más ingresos.
El sueño de José es sacar más producción de maíz y frijoles y vender una parte y lo demás dejarlo para los gastos de la casa para el sostenimiento de su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and 2 children. He has worked for many years planting dry grains such as corn and beans. His father taught him this trade which is why he doesn't have a fixed work schedule from Monday to Saturday.

He needs the loan to buy consumables such as: herbicides for pests and seeds for sowing, manure so that his harvest is abundant and free of pests. Although he knows that it is a hard job he knows that eventually it gives good yields and more revenue.

José's dream is to increase his corn and bean yields so as to be able to sell part of the harvest and keep the rest for household consumption.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, manure and seeds for sowing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and pay personal expenses.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Marisol tiene 21 años, convive con Luis de 23 años, con quien tiene 01 hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Puerto Cocos, Pichari. Su trabajo consiste en la agricultura, ya que gracias a ello puede obtener una estabilidad económica para el bien de su familia y ofrecer a su hijo una buena educación. Es así que se desarrolla en esa actividad, que empezó solo con una pequeña parcela sembrando cacao, y con el pasar del tiempo logró ampliar su siembra, hoy produce en catidad este grano que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado. Su  esposo es quien más la apoya en éste trabajo, pero cuando se trata de trabajos más fuertes debe contratar peones para que lo ayuden en la siembra así como en la extracción y recolección del grano de cacao. Siendo éstos llevados a los comerciantes mayoristas o a los Centros de Acopio de su comunidad. Por tanto espera en el futuro poder ampliar su siembra así obtendrá más productos y con ello cumplir con la demanda que tiene de sus compradores. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1.000 soles que solicita, podrá contratar peones para que lo ayuden a limpiar su parcela y cuidar sus plantas.
texts.en:
Marisol is 21 years old and lives with her partner Luis who is 23.  The couple have one child and live together in their own home which is located in Puerto Cocos community, in Pichari.

Marisol is a farmer and, thanks to her work, she is able to obtain financial stability for the good of her family and offer her son a good education.  She started working as a farmer with only a small plot of land, growing cacao.  Over time, she managed to expand her plantings and she now produces a large quantity of cacao which has good market demand.  Her husband supports her in this work but when there are larger jobs to be done, she must hire laborers to help, for example when sowing and also when picking and collecting the cacao beans.  Her produce is taken to the wholesalers or to middlemen at the storage warehouses in her community.  In the future, Marisol hopes to expand her plantings and grow more products so that she can meet her buyers' demands.

This will be Marisol's first loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She will use the 1,000 soles she is requesting to hire laborers to help her weed her plot of land and care for her plants.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es: José,esta solicitando un préstamo, el cual lo utilizara para comprar fertilizantes para las plagas, ya que sus hortalizas deben estar protegidas, actualmente tiene en su cultivo ejotes, chiles tomates, de lo que espera tener una buena produccion, de esa forma podrá tener productos para el consumo familiar y para vender.
texts.en:
José is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers for pest infestations because his plants need to be protected.

He currently has bean, chili, and tomato crops with which he hopes to have a good production.  This way he will be able to have products for family consumption and to sell.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to prevent pest infestations.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay a personal expense.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Ana Milagro

texts.es: Ana,nuevamente esta solicitando préstamo,  lo necesita para fortalecer su negocio y comprar; leña y maíz, por el cual tendrá producto para poder seguir aumentando en su negocio, ademas de encontrar un mejor precio por la compra mayoritaria, Estos prestamo le han ayudado, ha logrado aumentar en numero de clientes y sus ganancias han sido mayores, ya que con el prestamo, consigue el maiz a un mejor precio.
texts.en: Ana is again applying for a loan which she needs in order to strengthen her business and buy firewood and corn. In this way she will have the products necessary for her to continue growing her business, as well as obtain a better price by buying in bulk. These loans have helped her. She has managed to increase the number of customers and her income as with the loan she can buy the corn at a better price.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise such as cosmetics, basic grains, and other perishable products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal to improve the roof.

loans.name: Patrocinia

texts.es:
Patrocinia,la necesidad actual de Patrocinia es la falta de dinero para invertir en ropa, por eso a través de esta solicitud quiere obtener el préstamo que le ayude para comprar blusas, faldas, ropa interior, para ambos sexos y además ropa de niño, la compra le será muy útil para mejorar las ventas, ya que ofrecerá diversidad de prendas nuevas.
Estos prestamos han sido un gran apoyo para el negocio de Patrocinia, ya que logro pagar y poder solicitar un nuevo.
texts.en:
Patrocinia currently lacks money to invest in buying clothes.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan which will help her to buy blouses, skirts and underwear for both men and women, and also children's clothes.  This purchase will be very useful to her in improving her sales as she will be able to offer a variety of new garments.

These loans have been a great support to Patrocinia's business as she managed to repay her previous one and request a new one.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts and underwear.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a  la venta de ropa, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 7 años de edad, ella trabaja todos los días, visitando los pueblos y cantones cercanos ofreciendo la ropa, esta actividad la realiza desde hace muchos años y ha logrando mantenerse con sus clientes.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de pantalones jeans, esta inversión le ayudara ya que sus clientes le demandaban estas prendas de vestir y espera que las ventas mejoren al igual que sus ganancias.
La aspiración de Rosa es crecer con la clientela y poseer un local propio de venta.
texts.en:
Rosa has a business selling clothing.  She lives with her husband and 7 year-old child.  She works every day, visiting the towns and nearby cantons offering her clothing for sale.  She has been doing this type of work for many years, and with her customers she has been able to support herself.  

Now she requests a loan to buy jeans.  This investment will help her because her customers are demanding this kind of garment.  She hopes that with this investment her sales will improve and she will have greater earnings.

Rosa aspires to grow her customer base, and to have her own store.

loans.use: to buy jeans for her business selling clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Milagro Del Socorro

texts.es:
En el municipio de Quezalguaque departamento de león, la señora milagro  se dedica arduamente  a laborar como maestra, actualmente esta desempeñándose como técnica en educación, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace 10 años y 1 año en el nuevo cargo, es casada con 3 grandes hijos a los que tiene que proporcionarles  las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrollen.
Una de las necesidades que la señora milagro atraviesa hoy en día es de proporcionar a sus hijos de herramientas técnica para el desarrollo educativo de los mismos, lo que le `permitió tomar la decisión sabia de visitar a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de una computadora, ya que por medio de esta actividad brindara mejores condiciones de vida y a ella propia ya que el uso también lo efectuara ella en los planes de trabajo de su especialidad.  
Cabe mencionar la importancia del medio en la familia.
texts.en:
Milagro lives in the Quezalguaque municipality of León department. She works hard as a teacher. Presently, she is acting as an education technician, She has worked in this profession for ten years, and for one year in her new position. She is married, with three older children, to whom she has to provide the conditions necessary for their development. 

One of the needs that Milagro has at the present time, is providing her children with the technical tools for their educational development, This is what led  to her decision to approach Ceprodel for a loan to buy a computer. In this way, she will offer them a better standard of living; and it will help her too, since she will make use of it for planned work in her specialty area. 

It is worth mentioning that this is an important resource for the family.

loans.use: To buy a computer.

loans.name: Yolisa

texts.es: Yoliza, de 30 años de edad, convive con Román de 38 años, con quien tiene 03 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Se considera como una mujer perseverante y trabajadora, desde niña junto a sus queridos padres, quienes la enseñaron como desenvolverse en los negocios. Es así que empezó su trabajo de manera ambulante, hasta que logró juntar un capital y con ello montó su propia tienda de abarrotes vendiendo ahí mismo prendas de vestir. Ell esta feliz  con el negocio que ejerce, por que gracias a ello es que puede darle una buena educación a sus tres menores hijos, quienes también la apoyan en la venta de sus prodcutos. Para el futuro espera tener su neogico en una de las isntalacioens del centro comercial, por ello se esta esforzándo para captar más clientes. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en realizar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 soles, comprara más productos para abastecer su tienda.
texts.en:
Yoliza is 30 years old and lives with Román, 38, with whom she has three children.  They live in their own home in the Pichari District in central Peru.  She is considered to be persistent and hardworking.  From childhood, she worked alongside her beloved parents, who taught her how to run a business. 

Yoliza began her own business working on the street until she managed to raise some capital.  With her earnings, she opened her own store where she began selling clothes.  She is happy with her business because it allows her to provide a good education to her three young children, who help her in her product sales.  In the future, she hopes to locate her business in a building in the commercial center where she can reach more customers.

This is her third loan cycle with Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma.  She is committed to making timely payments on her loans.  With the 2,000 soles ($750), she will buy more products to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy more products to stock her store.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ernestina; ella tiene 57 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como perfumes, cremas, lápiz labiales entre otros productos de belleza, la socia trabaja en forma independiente desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lápiz labial, perfumes y cremas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ernestina belongs to the communal bank "Kanchary."  This bank is located in the Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.

Ernestina is 57 years old, single, and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling beauty products such as: perfumes, creams, lipstick, and other beauty products.  She works independently from 7am until 9pm, and through this business she provides for her child.  She wants to expand and improve her business selling beauty products.  She requests a loan to buy lipstick, perfumes and creams at wholesale.

Ernestina is pleased to have this loan, and she pledges to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, perfumes and creams at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Oscar Mauricio

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 8,10 y 16 años, el se dedica a alquiler de taxi donde los clientes llegan y lo contratan para el día o dos días dependen para que lo necesitan, trabaja todos los días de lunes a domingo .
El préstamo lo necesita para arreglo del taxi como (cambio de llantas, pago de nuevas placas, refrenda de tarjetas) de esa forma tendrá en mejor estado el taxi y tendrá mejor equipo de trabajo, podrá darles más atención a sus clientes y de esa forma podrá obtener más ingresos.
El propósito de Oscar, comprar más taxis y trabajar con dinero propio y darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar lives with his wife and three children, ages 8, 10, and 16.  He operates a taxi, where his customers hire it for the day or for two days, depending on what they need it for. He works every day from Monday to Sunday.  

He needs the loan for to fix his taxi (change the tires, buy new license plates, renew his permits).  In this way, his taxi will be in better condition and he'll be better equipped for his work. He will be able to give his customers better service, and in this way earn a better income. 

Oscar's goal is to buy more taxis, work with his own money, and give his family a better life.

loans.use: To change his tires, pay for new licence plates and renew his permits.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosario; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de joyería y artesanía, ella vende collares, aretes y pulseras, ella vende en forma independiente desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 
7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de joyería y venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar collares, pulseras, aretes y artesanía como chompas, polos, pantalones y muñecas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosario belongs to the “Kanchary" communal bank. The members live in the Cusco district, which is part of the province and department of Cusco. 

Rosario is 46, single, and has one son.  In addition to her daily activities, she has a business selling jewellery and crafts. She sells necklaces, earrings, and bracelets. She sells on her own from 8:00am to 7:00pm, and by means of this business, she is raising her child.  

She wants to expand the business of selling jewellery and crafts. She is asking for the loan in order to buy at wholesale: necklaces, bracelets, earrings, and crafts such as sweaters, polo shirts, pants, and dolls. She is happy to get the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy at wholesale: necklaces, bracelets, earrings, and crafts such as sweaters, polo shirts, pants, and dolls.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheets of metal to improve his roof

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for personal expenses

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es conviviente tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapatos, ella vende zapatos para varones, mujeres y niñas, la socia atiende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de zapatos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar zapatos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Julia belongs to the communal bank "Kanchary." This bank is located in the Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.

Julia is 35 years old, lives with a partner, and has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling shoes.  She sells shoes for men, women and children.  She does this work from 9am until 8pm, and through this business she provides for her children. She wants to expand and improve her business selling shoes. She requests a loan to buy shoes at wholesale.

Julia is pleased to have this loan, and she pledges to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale

loans.name: 4 De Mayo Sector 4 Group

texts.es:
La señora Cristina Isabela es casada, tiene 49 años D. edad, estudio los estudios D. educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos D. los cuales estudian 3, se dedica a la tejeduría D. telas típicas, servilletas, cortes, sabanas; también se dedica a la crianza D. gallinas, inició criando solo algunas gallinas y ahora quiere incrementar el numero D. animales, hasta ahora lleva 20 años D. experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra D. otras gallinas y D. esta forma incrementar su pequeña granja, espera en el futuro tener una granja mas granD. y vender huevos. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la tejeduría, crianza D. animales, atención D. tienda en general y a la sastrería.
texts.en:
Cristina Isabela is 49 years old, married, and completed her primary education.  She has five children, three of whom are in school.  She weaves traditional fabrics, napkins, outfits and sheets. She also works raising chickens.  She started out with fewer hens and now she would like to increase the number.  She has 20 years experience.

Cristina Isabela is requesting a loan to buy more hens and thereby increase her production and profits.  She hopes, in the future, to have a larger farm and sell eggs.  The other members of this group weave, raise animals, run stores and make clothes.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Denis Ignacio

texts.es:
En el municipio de Telica Departamento de León el señor Denis , se dedica arduamente a la labor Agrícola desde hace 15 años, es casado no tiene hijos. Son solo él y su esposa con la que trabaja para tener mejores condiciones  necesarias para desarrollarse.

Una de las necesidades que el señor Denis atraviesa hoy en día es de financiamiento para compra de  insumos como urea  y gradeo para poder sembrar y ejercer su actividad, ya que es la manera de trabajo propio, por eso tomó la decisión acertada de visitar la oficina de Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de lo antes mencionado ya que del resultado de la cosecha brindará mejores condiciones a su esposa y su hogar mismo.

Cabe mencionar que debido a esta actividad le proporcionara condiciones necesarias al desarrollo del hogar.
texts.en:
In the town of Telica, in the department of León, Denis has worked arduously at agriculture for fifteen years. He is married and has no children, only he and his wife with whom he works to have improved conditions necessary for development. 

One of the necessities that Dennis is going through today is financing in order to buy supplies such as Urea and harrowing to be able to sow and practice his trade, which is how he makes a living. That is why he made the fitting decision to visit Ceprodel's offices to ask for a loan to buy the previously mentioned items. As a result, the harvest will bring about better conditions for his wife and their home. There is room to mention that owing to this activity he will be provided with necessary conditions to develop his home.

loans.use: to buy urea and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jaime; el tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el socio es chofer y realiza servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el trabajo como chofer. El  socio solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de su carro para comprar repuestos de carro.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jaime belongs to the communal bank "Kanchary." This bank is located in the Cusco district in the province and department of Cusco.

Jaime is 34 years old, lives with a partner, and has 2 children. He alternates his daily activities with his passenger transportation business. He is a driver who provides taxi services.  He works from 6am until 9pm, and through this business he provides for his children. He wants to expand and improve his taxi business. He requests a loan to do maintenance work on his car and to buy spare parts for his car.

Jaime is pleased to have this loan, and he pledges to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on his car and to buy spare parts for it

loans.name: Santos Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Santos Pablo es casado, tiene 32 años de edad, cursó el tercer años de educación básica, tiene 1 hijos el cual aun no estudia, se dedica a la tejeduría, al tejido de cortes, rebosas, sabanas, servilletas, inició este trabajo como operario y hasta el momento lleva 15 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a atender una tienda.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases  y colores, espera en el futuro contar con grande capital.
texts.en: Santos Pablo is 32 years old, married and has a 3rd grade education.  He has one child who is not yet in school.  He has a weaving business.  He weaves traditional skirts, scarfs, bedcovers, and napkins.  He started doing this work as an employee, and has 15 years of experience.  He relies on the support of his wife, who works attending to a store.  He requests a loan to buy yarn of different types and colors.  In the future, he hopes to have more capital to work with.

loans.use: to buy yarn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Nelson; el tiene 22 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de baterías, el socio vende baterías para carros, el tiene un pequeña tienda donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio quiere ahorrar y salir adelante, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de baterías. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar baterías al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nelson, 22, is a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  He’s single and alternates his daily activities with selling batteries.  He sells car batteries.  

He has a small store where he works from 8am until 7pm.  He wants to earn savings through the business to get ahead.  He wants to expand and improve his battery sales business and is asking for the loan to buy batteries at wholesale.  He is happy about the loan and commits to make is installment payments.

loans.use: to buy batteries at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to hire day workers.

loans.name: Las Samaritanas Group

texts.es:
La señora Elena Noemi es casada, tiene 36 años D. edad, cursó los estudios D. educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició este trabajo como amarradora y posteriormente compro un telar, y hasta ahora lleva 13 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que  lo utilizara para la compra D. hilos que es materia principal en la elaboración D. tejidos, espera en el futuro tener mucho capital y muchos clientes. Las demás integrantes se dedica a la tejeduría, crianza D. animales, y a la venta D. ropa.
texts.en:
Elena Noemí is married, 36, and completed her elementary school studies. She has 4 children who are studying. She works as a weaver, and started this line of business by dying fabrics and later purchased a loom. She has 13 years of experience, and is helped by her husband, who is in the same business.

She organized a group in order to ask for a loan, which she will use to buy thread that she will use to make woven goods. In the future she hopes to have much more capital and more clients. The other group members work in weaving, raising animals, and selling clothes.

loans.use: to buy weaving supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement and sand.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón está ubicado en el departamento de León y es una zona que se ha caracterizado por ser agropecuaria. Acá vive la señora Martha donde tiene una finca en la cual ha invertido mucho porque es un medio que le permite obtener el desarrollo para su vida.

Actualmente  acudió a Ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para dar lugar al mantenimiento de su finca, dicha reparación es necesaria hacerla lo más apronto posible y requiere la compra de materiales como lo es el  alambre y a su vez requiere el pago de mano de obra. Esto le permitirá obtener un mejor potencial de producción de leche en su inventario ganadero y así podrá continuar comercializándola en su localidad y sin ningún inconveniente.
texts.en:
Santa Rosa del Peñón is located in León Department and it’s a zone that’s noted for animal husbandry.  Martha lives here and she has a farm that she’s invested much into because it’s her source of support for her life’s development.

She called upon Ceprodel to request a loan to do some improvements on her farm.  She needs to carry out these repairs as soon as possible and needs to buy materials, like wire, and also to pay labor costs.  This will allow her to increase her potential for milk production from her dairy cattle to continue selling it in her location problem free.

loans.use: to buy wire and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
El señor Juan José es un pequeño agricultor dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos específicamente frijoles y maíz en el municipio de San Rafael del Sur. Es padre de tres hijos a los que ha brindado las condiciones necesarias para su desarrollo.

Solicita el crédito para dar lugar a la compra de insumos agrícolas para proceder a la siembra y posteriormente a la cosecha.  Espera que su crédito sea financiado satisfactoriamente para continuar con la labor y así aumentar sus ingresos del hogar con la venta de los granos.
texts.en:
Juan José is a small farmer dedicated to growing basic grains, specifically beans and corn, in the town of San Rafael del Sur.  He’s the father of three children that he’s provided the necessary conditions for their development to.

He asks for the loan to buy some farming supplies to proceed to plant and subsequently to harvest.  He hopes the loan will be satisfactorily financed to continue working and thus increase household income with the sale of his grains.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beef, chicken oil and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand and metal sheeting.

loans.name: Santos Evaristo

texts.es:
El señor Santos se dedica a la agricultura habiendo alcanzado amplia experiencia en esta actividad. Se ha asociado con otros productores para el intercambio de mano de obra con el fin de obtener apoyo para la cosecha. Es padre de dos hijos  a los que ha mantenido y proporcionado buenas condiciones para su desarrollo. 

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas tales como fertilizantes y compra de alimentos para continuar sus labores de siembra y aprovechar el invierno ya que así puede obtener una mejor cosecha en su localidad.
texts.en:
Santos is a farmer; he has ample experience in this occupation.  He has joined together with other farmers to share labor costs during harvest.  He’s the father of two children that he’s supported and provided good conditions for their growth and development.

He’s asking for the loan to buy farming supplies, like fertilizers and plant food, to continue his planting activities and take advantage of winter because better harvests are possible in his location that way.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for his bean crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: José Angel

texts.es:
José Ángel se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos en la zona del manzano, en donde estos suelos se caracterizan por ser suelos aptos para el establecimiento de estos rubros por ser suelos fértiles.

Ha dedicado parte de su vida a la actividad agrícola y por esto es que  solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas con el fin de mejorar los rendimientos y de esta forma obtener mejores cosechas para brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su amada familia.
texts.en:
José Ángel grows basic grains in El Manzano region where the soil is noted as being suitable for farming because it is fertile soil.

José Ángel has dedicated part of his life to farming and he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies with the aim of improving his yield and thereby obtaining better harvests.  This will enable him to provide his much-loved family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to pay laborers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement and sand

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana es una pequeña agricultora que cuenta con una experiencia de más de once años en la actividad agrícola por lo que ha desarrollado gran aptitud y perseverancia en esta labor que es la que le permite llevar el sustento a su mesa día a día.

Actualmente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de todos y cada uno de los insumos agrícolas con el fin de mejorar los rendimientos de sus cultivos, es madre de dos hijos y espera ser beneficiada con el crédito para así llevar a cabo su trabajo agrícola.
texts.en:
Juana is a small-scale farmer who has more than eleven years experience in this business.  She has developed great skill and perseverance in this line of work which allows her to put bread on the table every day.

Juana is currently requesting a loan to buy farming supplies with the aim of improving her crop yield.  She is the mother of two children and hopes to benefit from this loan so that she can carry out her farming work.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for sowing her beans and corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soap, sugar, coffee, oil, rice, cosmetics and candies

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es:
En el municipio de San Rafael del Sur en Managua, el caballero Javier se ha dedicado al cultivo de frijoles el cual los vende en su localidad y por medio de este trabajo puede llevar el sustento a su familia. 

Es menester para Javier obtener un crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de los insumos agrícolas para mejorar su trabajo y así tener una excelente cosecha y así beneficiar a sus pequeños hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar y por tal motivo requieren del apoyo de su padre.
texts.en:
In the town of San Rafael del Sur, in Managua, Javier's business is growing beans.  He sells his crops in his town and, through this work, he is able to support his family.

Javier needs to take out a loan to invest in buying farming supplies so that he can improve his work and enjoy an excellent harvest.  This will benefit his young school-age children who need their father's support.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for sowing his beans and to pay laborers

loans.name: Sopheng

texts.en: Sopheng, 32 years-old, is a motor taxi driver around Phnom Penh city and he earns $10 per day. His wife works in a garment factory and earns $4 per day. This couple has three children, two are studying and another is too young for school. Every month, they spend $110 on food, $6 on electricity, $40 on school fees, and $10 on other expenses. He would like to request a loan of $1,100 in order to buy a new motorbike to pull a tok tok for his career. His current motorbike is old and needs a lot of fixing so he decided to buy a new motorbike for his convenience.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to pull a Tok Tok for his career.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials for the repair of his living quarters.

loans.name: Rossel

texts.en:
Rossel is 31 years-old. She is married with five children. 

Rossel has a food shop or carenderia that sells snacks and viands like chicken and pork adobo, and pancit bihon. She has had this business for six years. She requested a loan of PHP 16,000 in order to buy raw ingredients needed for making snacks and viands.

Rossel has been a member of  Kiva partner HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Rossel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making snacks and viands.

loans.name: Noemí Del Socorro

texts.es: Este cliente labora para un centro escolar de la zona de villa el Carmen, se desempeña como docente teniendo la función de enseñar a niños para prepararlos para el futuro, es madre de un hijo en edad  escolar, casada y solicita crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción ya que requiere y es merecedor de vivir de forma más digna, ella y su familia. Para esto espera ser siempre beneficiada con estos créditos para continuar haciendo mejoras en su hogar.
texts.en: This client works for a school in the Villa el Carmen zone.  She’s a teacher.   Her job is to prepare children for the future.  She’s the mother of a school age son.  She’s married and is asking for the loan to buy building materials and supplies because she wants and deserves a more dignified way to live for herself and her family.  She hopes to always be benefitted by these loans to continue doing home improvements.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 36 years-old.  She is married with four children. 
Evelyn has a shop that sells RTW or ready to wear clothing such as underwear, blouses and shirts. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 in order to buy clothing such as t-shirts and blouses to sell.

Evelyn has been a member of Kiva partner HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Evelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as t-shirts and blouses to sell.

loans.name: Vergie

texts.en:
Vergie is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children.

Vergie has a shop that sells snacks, detergents, beverages, and soaps. She has had this business for one year. She requested a loan for 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy detergents, soaps, and snacks to sell.

Vergie has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Vergie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy detergents, soaps, and snacks to sell.

loans.name: Yan

texts.en:
Mrs. Yan is a 30-year-old villager who has been living in Steung Sen district of Kompong Thom province. To earn a living, Mrs. Yan works as a farmer, growing rice crop. Her husband, Mr. Hak, works as a local construction foreman. They are blessed with two school-aged children. Together, they typically earn the equivalent of $15 USD per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Currently, Mrs. Yan has only a few plots of farmland, which produces an unsatisfactory amount for the family’s requirements during the year. Therefore, Mrs. Yan requests a loan through HKL, a Kiva partner. She will use this loan to purchase additional farmland for growing rice. She hopes that this loan will make her living conditions better.

loans.use: to purchase additional farmland for growing rice.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a 57-year-old lady who is married to Yunus, a 57-year-old man. They have two children: Marina, 34 and Andi, 28. Both of the children are married. Andi and family are still living with Maria while Marina lives separately.

Maria used to work in a government agency and retired one year ago. In order to spend the time after retiring, Maria is raising livestock such as “Bangkok” chickens and ducks to assist her husband in generating more income.

Currently, Maria is planning to improve her business by raising chickens and selling fried cakes such as fried banana, donuts and bread. She has built the stall but she does not have money to do the business. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of IDR 7,500,000 from TLM to purchase chicks and ingredients for cakes such as wheat flour, eggs, sugar, etc. Maria is expecting that TLM will approve her loan application.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and ingredients for cakes such as wheat flour, eggs, sugar, etc

loans.name: Jhoan

texts.en: Jhoan is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child.  Jhoan has a shop that sells green and yellow bananas. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan for PHP 14,000 to buy additional bananas to sell.  Jhoan has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Jhoan hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy additional bananas to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making breads and pastries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy tools and pay for gasoline to maintain her transport services.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks and beverages for re-sale.

loans.name: Geronides

texts.en:
Geronides is 55 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 
Geronides has a food shop, or carenderia, that sells viands like caldereta (comforting beef stew), afritada (tomato-based chicken dish) & bulalo (stew made from beef shanks and marrow bones). She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for PHP 11,000 to buy raw ingredients needed for making viands.
Geronides has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Geronides hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making viands (tasty dishes)

loans.name: Lim
